= "Property Injection" (PInj) Nanoarchitecture =

...

=== Property Injection with Parsley ===
{{{
	[Subscribe(scope='appModel', objectId='settings')]
	[Bindable]
	public var settings:SettingsVO;
}}}
_Source available in the  [http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/LoginExampleFx4HaloParsleyMVCbCtl_PInj/trunk/src/main/flex/com/masuland/loginexample/view/cb/SettingsBoxCB.as svn repo]._

=== Property Injection with Spring ===
{{{
	[Inject(name='appModel', property='settings')]
	[Bindable]
	public var settings:SettingsVO;
}}}
_Source available in the  [http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/LoginExampleFx4HaloSpringMVCbCtl_PInj/trunk/src/main/flex/com/masuland/loginexample/view/codebehind/SettingsBoxCB.as svn repo]._

=== Property Injection with Swiz ===
{{{
	[Inject(source="appModel.settings", bind="true")]
	[Bindable]
	public var settings:SettingsVO;
}}}
_Source available in the  [http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/LoginExampleFx4HaloSwizMVCbCtl_PInj/trunk/src/main/flex/com/masuland/loginexample/view/codebehind/SettingsBoxCB.as svn repo]._
